```{=html}
<script>
// Data management system - tracking data collection progress
let dataItems = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Fisheries Production Records",
    type: "Non-Spatial (CSV)",
    source: "Ministry of Fisheries",
    status: "in-progress",
    progress: 65,
    createdDate: "2026-01-10",
    member: "John Mwase",
    description: "Annual fisheries production data including species catch volumes and economic value",
    file: null
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Marine Protected Areas",
    type: "Spatial (Shapefile)",
    source: "Marine Conservation Commission",
    status: "completed",
    progress: 100,
    createdDate: "2025-12-15",
    member: "Sarah Banda",
    description: "Spatial boundaries and regulations for protected marine zones",
    file: null
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Community Survey Data",
    type: "Non-Spatial (Excel)",
    source: "Local Communities",
    status: "not-started",
    progress: 0,
    createdDate: "2026-01-08",
    member: "Peter Chimwanda",
    description: "Community perception and socioeconomic survey responses",
    file: null
  }
];

// Global file storage
window.uploadedFiles = {};

// Check authentication
function checkAuth() {
  return sessionStorage.getItem('lmsp_user') !== null;
}

// Initialize page
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const isAuth = checkAuth();
  
  if (!isAuth) {
    document.getElementById('mainContent').innerHTML = '<div style="text-align: center; padding: 40px; color: #999;"><p>Please log in to manage data.</p></div>';
    return;
  }
  
  renderDataList();
  loadDataFromStorage();
  setupFileUploadHandlers();
});

// Load data from localStorage
function loadDataFromStorage() {
  const saved = localStorage.getItem('lmsp_data_items');
  if (saved) {
    dataItems = JSON.parse(saved);
    renderDataList();
  }
}

// Save data to localStorage
function saveDataItems() {
  localStorage.setItem('lmsp_data_items', JSON.stringify(dataItems));
}

// Render data list
function renderDataList() {
  const container = document.getElementById('dataListContainer');
  container.innerHTML = '';
  
  dataItems.forEach(item => {
    const statusColor = item.status === 'completed' ? '#4caf50' : 
                       item.status === 'in-progress' ? '#ff9800' : '#ccc';
    const statusText = item.status === 'completed' ? 'Completed' : 
                      item.status === 'in-progress' ? 'In Progress' : 'Not Started';
    
    const fileBadge = item.file && window.uploadedFiles[item.file] 
      ? `<span style="background: #2a5298; color: white; padding: 4px 10px; border-radius: 12px; font-size: 0.85em; font-weight: 600; margin-left: 10px;">📎 ${window.uploadedFiles[item.file].name}</span>`
      : '';
    
    const card = document.createElement('div');
    card.className = 'data-card';
    card.innerHTML = `
      <div class="card-header">
        <div class="card-title">
          <h3>${item.name}</h3>
          <p class="card-meta">${item.type}  ${item.source}</p>
        </div>
        <button class="btn-edit" onclick="openEditModal(${item.id})"> Edit</button>
      </div>
      
      <div class="card-body">
        <div class="member-info">
          <strong>Member:</strong> <span>${item.member || 'N/A'}</span>
        </div>
        <div class="description-info">
          <strong>Description:</strong> <span>${item.description || 'No description'}</span>
        </div>
        ${item.file && window.uploadedFiles[item.file] ? `
        <div style="margin-top: 12px; padding: 10px; background: #e3f2fd; border-radius: 6px;">
          <strong style="color: #1976d2;">📎 Attached File:</strong>
          <div style="margin-top: 8px; display: flex; gap: 10px; flex-wrap: wrap;">
            <span style="color: #1e3c72; font-weight: 600;">${window.uploadedFiles[item.file].name}</span>
            <button type="button" class="btn-view-file" onclick="viewAttachedFile('${item.file}')">View Data</button>
          </div>
        </div>
        ` : ''}
      </div>
      
      <div class="progress-section">
        <div class="progress-info">
          <span class="status-label" style="background: ${statusColor};">${statusText}</span>
          <span class="progress-percent">${item.progress}%</span>
        </div>
        <div class="progress-bar">
          <div class="progress-fill" style="width: ${item.progress}%; background: ${statusColor};"></div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="card-footer">
        <small>Created: ${item.createdDate}</small>
        <button class="btn-delete" onclick="deleteDataItem(${item.id})"></button>
      </div>
    `;
    container.appendChild(card);
  });
}

// View attached file from data card
function viewAttachedFile(fileId) {
  if (!window.uploadedFiles[fileId]) {
    alert('File not found');
    return;
  }
  
  window.currentFileData = window.uploadedFiles[fileId];
  viewFileContent();
}

// Open edit modal
function openEditModal(id) {
  const item = dataItems.find(d => d.id === id);
  if (!item) return;
  
  window.currentEditItem = item;
  document.getElementById('modalTitle').textContent = 'Update Data: ' + item.name;
  document.getElementById('editName').value = item.name;
  document.getElementById('editType').value = item.type;
  document.getElementById('editSource').value = item.source;
  document.getElementById('editStatus').value = item.status;
  document.getElementById('editProgress').value = item.progress;
  document.getElementById('editMember').value = item.member || '';
  document.getElementById('editDescription').value = item.description || '';
  document.getElementById('progressValue').textContent = item.progress + '%';
  
  document.getElementById('editModal').style.display = 'block';
}

// Open new data form
function openNewDataForm() {
  window.currentEditItem = null;
  window.currentFileData = null;
  document.getElementById('modalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Data';
  document.getElementById('editForm').reset();
  document.getElementById('progressValue').textContent = '0%';
  removeFileUpload();
  document.getElementById('editModal').style.display = 'block';
}

// Update progress value display
function updateProgressDisplay(value) {
  document.getElementById('progressValue').textContent = value + '%';
}

// Save data item
function saveDataItem() {
  const name = document.getElementById('editName').value.trim();
  const type = document.getElementById('editType').value.trim();
  const source = document.getElementById('editSource').value.trim();
  const status = document.getElementById('editStatus').value;
  const progress = parseInt(document.getElementById('editProgress').value);
  const member = document.getElementById('editMember').value.trim();
  const description = document.getElementById('editDescription').value.trim();
  
  if (!name || !type || !source || !member || !description) {
    alert('Please fill in all required fields');
    return;
  }
  
  if (window.currentEditItem) {
    // Update existing
    window.currentEditItem.name = name;
    window.currentEditItem.type = type;
    window.currentEditItem.source = source;
    window.currentEditItem.status = status;
    window.currentEditItem.progress = progress;
    window.currentEditItem.member = member;
    window.currentEditItem.description = description;
    
    // Add file if uploaded
    if (window.currentFileData) {
      const fileId = 'file_' + window.currentEditItem.id + '_' + Date.now();
      window.uploadedFiles[fileId] = window.currentFileData;
      window.currentEditItem.file = fileId;
    }
    
    showMessage('Data updated successfully!', 'success');
  } else {
    // Create new
    const newId = Math.max(...dataItems.map(d => d.id), 0) + 1;
    const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];
    
    let fileRef = null;
    if (window.currentFileData) {
      const fileId = 'file_' + newId + '_' + Date.now();
      window.uploadedFiles[fileId] = window.currentFileData;
      fileRef = fileId;
    }
    
    dataItems.push({
      id: newId,
      name,
      type,
      source,
      status,
      progress,
      member,
      description,
      createdDate: today,
      file: fileRef
    });
    showMessage('Data added successfully!', 'success');
  }
  
  saveDataItems();
  closeModal();
  renderDataList();
}

// Delete data item
function deleteDataItem(id) {
  if (confirm('Delete this data item permanently?')) {
    dataItems = dataItems.filter(d => d.id !== id);
    saveDataItems();
    renderDataList();
    showMessage('Data deleted!', 'success');
  }
}

// Modal functions
function closeModal() {
  document.getElementById('editModal').style.display = 'none';
  window.currentEditItem = null;
  window.currentFileData = null;
  removeFileUpload();
}

function showMessage(msg, type) {
  const div = document.createElement('div');
  div.className = `message ${type}`;
  div.textContent = msg;
  document.body.appendChild(div);
  setTimeout(() => div.remove(), 3000);
}

// Close modal on outside click
window.onclick = function(e) {
  const modal = document.getElementById('editModal');
  if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
}

// File Upload Handlers
function setupFileUploadHandlers() {
  const fileUploadArea = document.getElementById('fileUploadArea');
  const fileInput = document.getElementById('fileUpload');
  
  if (!fileUploadArea || !fileInput) return;
  
  // Click to upload
  fileUploadArea.addEventListener('click', () => fileInput.click());
  
  // Drag and drop
  fileUploadArea.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    e.stopPropagation();
    fileUploadArea.classList.add('drag-over');
  });
  
  fileUploadArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
    fileUploadArea.classList.remove('drag-over');
  });
  
  fileUploadArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    e.stopPropagation();
    fileUploadArea.classList.remove('drag-over');
    
    const files = e.dataTransfer.files;
    if (files.length > 0) {
      handleFileUpload(files[0]);
    }
  });
  
  // File input change
  fileInput.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
    if (e.target.files.length > 0) {
      handleFileUpload(e.target.files[0]);
    }
  });
}

function handleFileUpload(file) {
  const validTypes = ['text/csv', 'application/json', 'application/octet-stream', 'image/tiff'];
  const validExtensions = ['.csv', '.json', '.geojson', '.gpkg', '.tif', '.tiff'];
  
  const fileExtension = '.' + file.name.split('.').pop().toLowerCase();
  
  if (!validExtensions.includes(fileExtension)) {
    alert('Invalid file type. Please upload CSV, GeoJSON, Geopackage (GPKG), or TIFF files.');
    return;
  }
  
  const reader = new FileReader();
  
  reader.onload = (e) => {
    try {
      const isBinary = fileExtension === '.gpkg' || fileExtension === '.tif' || fileExtension === '.tiff';
      const fileData = {
        name: file.name,
        size: file.size,
        type: file.type,
        extension: fileExtension,
        content: isBinary ? null : e.target.result,
        uploadDate: new Date().toLocaleString(),
        isBinary: isBinary,
        file: file
      };
      
      // Store file data
      window.currentFileData = fileData;
      
      // Display preview
      displayFilePreview(fileData);
    } catch (error) {
      alert('Error reading file: ' + error.message);
    }
  };
  
  reader.onerror = () => {
    alert('Error reading file');
  };
  
  // Read as text for text-based files, as binary for raster/database files
  if (fileExtension === '.gpkg' || fileExtension === '.tif' || fileExtension === '.tiff') {
    reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file);
  } else {
    reader.readAsText(file);
  }
}

function displayFilePreview(fileData) {
  const previewContainer = document.getElementById('filePreviewContainer');
  const fileSize = fileData.size > 1048576 ? (fileData.size / 1048576).toFixed(2) + ' MB' : (fileData.size / 1024).toFixed(2) + ' KB'; // KB or MB
  
  let statsHtml = '';
  if (fileData.extension === '.csv') {
    const lines = fileData.content.split('\n');
    const rowCount = lines.filter(line => line.trim()).length - 1; // Subtract header
    statsHtml = `
      <div class="file-preview-stat">
        <strong>Rows:</strong>
        <span>${rowCount}</span>
      </div>
      <div class="file-preview-stat">
        <strong>Size:</strong>
        <span>${fileSize}</span>
      </div>
    `;
  } else if (fileData.extension === '.json' || fileData.extension === '.geojson') {
    const json = JSON.parse(fileData.content);
    const itemCount = Array.isArray(json) ? json.length : (json.features ? json.features.length : 1);
    statsHtml = `
      <div class="file-preview-stat">
        <strong>Features:</strong>
        <span>${itemCount}</span>
      </div>
      <div class="file-preview-stat">
        <strong>Size:</strong>
        <span>${fileSize}</span>
      </div>
    `;
  } else if (fileData.extension === '.gpkg') {
    statsHtml = `
      <div class="file-preview-stat">
        <strong>Type:</strong>
        <span>Geopackage Database</span>
      </div>
      <div class="file-preview-stat">
        <strong>Size:</strong>
        <span>${fileSize}</span>
      </div>
    `;
  } else if (fileData.extension === '.tif' || fileData.extension === '.tiff') {
    statsHtml = `
      <div class="file-preview-stat">
        <strong>Type:</strong>
        <span>Raster Image (GeoTIFF)</span>
      </div>
      <div class="file-preview-stat">
        <strong>Size:</strong>
        <span>${fileSize}</span>
      </div>
    `;
  }
  
  previewContainer.innerHTML = `
    <div class="file-preview">
      <div class="file-preview-info">
        <div class="file-preview-name">📄 ${escapeHtml(fileData.name)}</div>
        <div class="file-preview-stats">
          ${statsHtml}
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="file-preview-actions">
        <button type="button" class="btn-view-file" onclick="viewFileContent()">👁️ View</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn-remove-file" onclick="removeFileUpload()">🗑️ Remove</button>
      </div>
    </div>
  `;
  
  previewContainer.style.display = 'block';
}

function viewFileContent() {
  if (!window.currentFileData) return;
  
  const fileData = window.currentFileData;
  
  // Handle binary files
  if (fileData.isBinary) {
    if (fileData.extension === '.gpkg') {
      alert('🗂️ Geopackage Database\n\nFile: ' + fileData.name + '\n\nSize: ' + (fileData.size / 1024).toFixed(2) + ' KB\n\nNote: Geopackage files contain vector and/or raster data stored in a SQLite database. To view the contents, use specialized GIS software like QGIS, ArcGIS, or similar tools.');
    } else if (fileData.extension === '.tif' || fileData.extension === '.tiff') {
      alert('🖼️ GeoTIFF Raster Image\n\nFile: ' + fileData.name + '\n\nSize: ' + (fileData.size / 1024).toFixed(2) + ' KB\n\nNote: This is a geospatial raster image. To visualize it, use GIS software like QGIS, ArcGIS, GDAL, or web-based viewers that support GeoTIFF format.');
    }
    return;
  }
  
  const overlay = document.createElement('div');
  overlay.style.position = 'fixed';
  overlay.style.top = '0';
  overlay.style.left = '0';
  overlay.style.width = '100%';
  overlay.style.height = '100%';
  overlay.style.background = 'rgba(0,0,0,0.6)';
  overlay.style.zIndex = '2999';
  overlay.style.display = 'flex';
  overlay.style.alignItems = 'center';
  overlay.style.justifyContent = 'center';
  overlay.style.backdropFilter = 'blur(2px)';
  overlay.id = 'fileViewerOverlay';
  
  let contentHtml = '';
  
  if (fileData.extension === '.csv') {
    const lines = fileData.content.split('\n');
    const headers = lines[0].split(',').map(h => h.trim());
    
    contentHtml = `
      <div class="file-viewer-modal">
        <button class="close-btn" onclick="closeFileViewer()">&times;</button>
        <h3>📄 ${escapeHtml(fileData.name)}</h3>
        <div class="file-table-container">
          <table>
            <thead>
              <tr>
                ${headers.map(h => `<th>${escapeHtml(h)}</th>`).join('')}
              </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
              ${lines.slice(1, 20).map(line => {
                if (!line.trim()) return '';
                const cells = line.split(',').map(c => c.trim());
                return `<tr>${cells.map(c => `<td>${escapeHtml(c)}</td>`).join('')}</tr>`;
              }).join('')}
            </tbody>
          </table>
        </div>
        ${lines.length > 21 ? `<p style="text-align: center; color: #999; margin-top: 15px;">Showing first 19 rows of ${lines.length - 1} total rows</p>` : ''}
      </div>
    `;
  } else if (fileData.extension === '.json' || fileData.extension === '.geojson') {
    try {
      const json = JSON.parse(fileData.content);
      const prettyJson = JSON.stringify(json, null, 2).substring(0, 3000);
      
      contentHtml = `
        <div class="file-viewer-modal">
          <button class="close-btn" onclick="closeFileViewer()">&times;</button>
          <h3>📋 ${escapeHtml(fileData.name)}</h3>
          <div class="json-viewer">${escapeHtml(prettyJson)}</div>
          ${JSON.stringify(json).length > 3000 ? '<p style="color: #999; margin-top: 10px;">... (truncated)</p>' : ''}
        </div>
      `;
    } catch {
      contentHtml = `
        <div class="file-viewer-modal">
          <button class="close-btn" onclick="closeFileViewer()">&times;</button>
          <h3>📋 ${escapeHtml(fileData.name)}</h3>
          <p>Error parsing JSON file</p>
        </div>
      `;
    }
  }
  
  overlay.innerHTML = contentHtml;
  document.body.appendChild(overlay);
  
  // Close on overlay click
  overlay.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
    if (e.target === overlay) closeFileViewer();
  });
}

function closeFileViewer() {
  const overlay = document.getElementById('fileViewerOverlay');
  if (overlay) overlay.remove();
}

function removeFileUpload() {
  window.currentFileData = null;
  document.getElementById('fileUpload').value = '';
  document.getElementById('filePreviewContainer').style.display = 'none';
  document.getElementById('filePreviewContainer').innerHTML = '';
}

function escapeHtml(text) {
  const div = document.createElement('div');
  div.textContent = text;
  return div.innerHTML;
}
</script>

/* Modal Styles */

.file-viewer-modal {
```
